reviews.review_msg: Really nice lady but should not be teaching a full course, in my opinion. Being a summer online course during the pandemic, you would expect a professor to take some initiative to make sure their students were aware of the due dates, etc; this was not the case with Joy. Also avoided setting up Zoom meetings and only sent a few emails in 4 months.
WORST PROF EVER. NEVER TAKE THIS CLASS.

She is SUPER nice, hilarious and inspiring. I took the fitness course with her and it was really interesting and relatable. She was realllyyyyy easy on the marking, you would have to hand in nothing to fail.

Joy is a very radiant person and I think this quality helped make her class fun to attend and something to look forward to especially with remote learning. I took this course this past summer and it was my first gender studies class. She was super understanding of the current circumstances. I'd definitely take a class with her again.
Joy is really good instructor. She always help students. If I get chance I take her class again, I will definitely do it.
Very funny, cares about your success and keeps the whole class engaged in lectures
Had a class about fitness culture. She is super nice and caring when it comes to helping you out to get a better mark. Her lectures are very engaging and she is very funny.
